author: Jacky Wong
title: BYD: Buffeted by Beijing
text:
China, electric vehicles and Warren Buffett have made BYD an investors’ darling for years, but it is struggling to stay in the fast lane.

Shares of the Buffett-backed Chinese car maker plunged 11% Wednesday after it said it’s expecting its net profit to slump 75%-92% this quarter. The dive is mostly down to Beijing’s decision to cut subsidies for new energy vehicles, which include hybrids, by 30%—at least until June, when it will bring in a new, stricter regime for supporting the sector. Such subsidies accounted for nearly...
